hero.title: In and out in 20 minutes
hero.subtitle: Fast oil changes, tire rotations, and essential maintenance - no appointment needed. Stay in your car service. Certified technicians. Quality products. Fair prices. Drive-in anytime during business hours!

about.title: Fast & Convenient
about.subtitle: No appointment necessary
about.content: QuickLube specializes in fast, quality service for busy people. Drive in anytime during business hours - no appointment needed. Stay in your car while certified techs perform your service. In and out in 20 minutes or less!

products.name: Signature Oil Change
products.description: Conventional oil change with filter. Includes fluid top-off and courtesy inspection. Done in 15-20 minutes.

products.name: Synthetic Oil Change
products.description: Full synthetic oil for better performance and engine protection. Premium filter included. Drive-through service.

products.name: Tire Rotation
products.description: Rotate all four tires for even wear. Extend tire life. Quick service, no appointment.

products.name: Air Filter Replacement
products.description: New engine air filter for better fuel economy and performance. Quality filters, fast service.

products.name: Battery Check & Replacement
products.description: Free battery test. Quality replacement batteries installed while you wait. 3-year warranty.

products.name: Full Service Package
products.description: Synthetic oil change + tire rotation + multi-point inspection. Best value! Done in 30 minutes.

items.text: In and out in 15 minutes! No appointment hassle, reasonable prices, and they're always friendly. My go-to for oil changes.
items.author: Sarah Williams
items.title: Regular Customer

items.text: Finally a place that respects your time! Quick service, never pushy with add-ons. Fair prices. Highly recommend!
items.author: Mike Rodriguez
items.title: Satisfied Customer

items.text: Great service, fast turnaround. They pointed out my battery was low and replaced it same visit. Convenient and honest!
items.author: Jennifer Lee
items.title: Happy Customer

members.name: Danny Wilson
members.title: Service Manager
members.bio: ASE certified technician with 12+ years experience in quick service. Trains all team members in quality service and customer care. Believes in honest, fast service.
